entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:52 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -41.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 06:53 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Visibility: 1.6 km

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
